thread.title: Mourinho Shuns Post-Match Conference After West Ham Loss
thread.title_full: Mourinho Shuns Post-Match Conference After West Ham Loss

author: Nurudeen Obalola
title: Mourinho Shuns Post-Match Conference After West Ham Loss
text:
Foreign , Headlines 
Jose Mourinho did not turn up for his post-match conference after Chelsea lost 2-1 to West Ham on Saturday. 
Goals from Mauro Zarate and Andy Carroll secured the win for West Ham. Gary Cahill got Chelseaâ€™s goal. 
Nemanja Matic was sent off after receiving a second yellow card. 
And during the interval, Mourinho was sent off by referee Jonathan Moss. 
On Friday, Mourinho said his relationship with the media would change after reports about him shoving a young boy who tried to take a selfie with the Chelsea manager. 
Chelsea have now lost five league games this season after 10 matches. Se
